info.title: WiiRadio
info.author: Scanff
info.details:
WiiRadio is a SHOUT/ICEcast stream player, ripper and music visualizer for the Wii.

Includes language packs, skinning capabilities and local music playback.

Coding By: Scanff and Knarrff
Graphics By: TiMeBoMb

--- Thanks To ---
.:: ProjectM ::.

projectM is an awesome music visualizer. 

http://projectm.sourceforge.net/

.:: Tantric ::.

Allowing me to use the libgui keyboard images.

.:: The Demo Effects Collection ::.

The main resource for the visual effects.  http://demo-effects.sourceforge.net/
